{{/* - Build template.js with main JS. - Nur nebenbei: Sind teils modules.mount. */}} {{/* Hab das nur mittels Match geschafft, damit ich unten append machen kann. */}} {{- $bootstrap := resources.Match "js/bootstrap/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" -}} {{- $vendor := resources.Match "js/vendor/*.js" -}} {{- $js := resources.Match "js/*.js" -}} {{- $loadAfter := resources.Match "js/loadafter/*.js" -}} {{- $templateJs := append $bootstrap $vendor | append $js | append $loadAfter | resources.Concat "/assets/js/template.js" -}} {{- if eq hugo.Environment "production" -}} {{- $templateJs = $templateJs | resources.Minify -}} {{- end -}} {{- $templateJs = $templateJs | resources.Fingerprint "sha256" -}} {{- partial "script.html" $templateJs -}}
